Ilingu F-Droid Repo

This is a repository of apps to be used with F-Droid. Applications in this repository are official binaries built by Ilingu. https://gitlab.com/fdroid.

Currently it serves 2 apps. To add it to your F-Droid app, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this link:

https://ilingu.github.io/fdroid/repo

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
77 D7 EF A9 82 E2 D3 CA 51 92 75 93 C1 B2 40 92 D4 5D 89 D2 3E 1A 29 86 44 59 C4 25 F4 F5 C5 AA
